name: Wb Aero (Glasser) - Menu and Navigation (3.5b99)
description:
The basics to my Aero theme, this contains the Menu bar and Navigation toolbar. This style requires the Glasser addon, and looks best with firefox 3.5b4+.

The entire Wb Aero Theme:
style 18093
style 19845
style 18094
style 18095
style 18096
style 19844

Updates:

[6/10/2009]
- A bunch of fixes for 3.5b99 (the "Firefox 3.5 Preview")
- The searchbar dropmarker now glows orange when a new search engine is discovered
- Removed all the "flair" from the urlbar favicon
- New style for urlbar on secure sites, mostly mimics IE8
- Got rid of the excess throbber code, only throbbers in the nav toolbar are changed

[4/24/2009]
- updated the search bar buttons

* Note: the screenshot contains some other components from my Wb Aero theme as well...
